SELECT unq, name, decode(upper(category),'CLS','옷','SHO','신발','오류') category, decode(upper(ctgtype),'SPT','스포츠','LES','레저','LIF','일상','오류') ctgtype, decode(upper(ctggender),'N','성별 무관','M','남성','F','여성','오류') ctggender, price, decode(sale,null,'할인코드없음',sale) sale, csize, color, thumbnail, goodsimg, info FROM goodsinfo WHERE unq=#unq#
